synopsis.text:
Government upheaval and the dawn of a new era in Japan set the stage for an unlikely trio's perilous journey. Izou, a one-eyed ronin grappling with his purpose, and Raiden, an orc striving to abandon his thieving ways, find themselves united in the protection of Sonya, a young elf girl. She carries a powerful wand, capable of ending wars and altering the course of history.

Their mission: to safely escort Sonya and her precious cargo to the elven lands in the north. However, the malevolent organization Inferni has other plans. Seeking to revive the Dark Lord and rule all of creation, they will stop at nothing to seize the wand. Even the new Meiji government becomes a pawn in their schemes.

As Izou and Raiden navigate the treacherous Tokaido road from Kyoto to Yokohama, they must confront their pasts and learn to trust each other. The future of Japan and the fate of the world rests on their success. Will they be able to overcome their differences and thwart Inferni's sinister plans, or will they fall to the darkness that threatens to consume them? Join Izou, Raiden, and Sonya on their thrilling adventure in this captivating anime.
